column4: Is there anyway to force 5.1 sound from stereo? All speakers work with 'speaker-test -c6 -D surround51', but I can't get sound from the rear speakers during mp3 playback or video files.
have you seen http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4451132 yet ? It has instructions on how to set up pulseaudio for 5.1 surround sound ..
